Token.Abstract: This class provides an interface for converting between strings, expression results, and values of other types, such as:
Attempts to interpret a string as a CGPoint value.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The string to interpret.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The CGPoint value that corresponds with str. Returns CGPointZero and logs an error to the console if str couldn't be interpreted.

Token.Abstract: Attempts to interpret a string as a CGPoint value.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The string to interpret.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an NSError instance in the event of a problem interpreting str. If non-nil and an error occurs, *errPtr will be set to an NSError instance indicating the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The CGPoint value that corresponds with str. Returns CGPointZero if str couldn't be interpreted.

Token.Abstract: Attempts to interpret an arbitrary object value as a CGPoint.

Parameter.Name: obj
Parameter.Abstract: The object to be interpreted.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an NSError instance in the event of a problem interpreting str. If non-nil and an error occurs, *errPtr will be set to an NSError instance indicating the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The CGPoint value that corresponds with obj. Returns CGPointZero if obj couldn't be interpreted.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates an object expression and attempts to interpret the result as a CGPoint value using the pointFromObject:error: method.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression whose result will be interpreted.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The CGPoint value that corresponds with the result of evaluating expr as a string. Returns CGPointZero and logs an error to the console if the expression result couldn't be interpreted.

Token.Abstract: Converts a CGPoint value into a string that can be parsed by pointFromString:.

Parameter.Name: val
Parameter.Abstract: The value to convert into a string.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string representation of val; never nil.

Token.Abstract: Attempts to interpret a string as a CGSize value.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The string to interpret.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The CGSize value that corresponds with str. Returns CGPointZero and logs an error to the console if str couldn't be interpreted.

Token.Abstract: Attempts to interpret a string as a CGSize value.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The string to interpret.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an NSError instance in the event of a problem interpreting str. If non-nil and an error occurs, *errPtr will be set to an NSError instance indicating the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The CGSize value that corresponds with str. Returns CGPointZero if str couldn't be interpreted.

Token.Abstract: Attempts to interpret an arbitrary object value as a CGSize.

Parameter.Name: obj
Parameter.Abstract: The object to be interpreted.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an NSError instance in the event of a problem interpreting str. If non-nil and an error occurs, *errPtr will be set to an NSError instance indicating the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The CGSize value that corresponds with obj. Returns CGSizeZero if obj couldn't be interpreted.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates an object expression and attempts to interpret the result as a CGSize value using the sizeFromObject:error: method.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression whose result will be interpreted.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The CGSize value that corresponds with the result of evaluating expr as a string. Returns CGSizeZero and logs an error to the console if the expression result couldn't be interpreted.

Token.Abstract: Converts a CGSize value into a string that can be parsed by sizeFromString:.

Parameter.Name: val
Parameter.Abstract: The value to convert into a string.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string representation of val; never nil.

Token.Abstract: Attempts to interpret a string as a CGRect value.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The string to interpret.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The CGRect value that corresponds with str. Returns CGRectZero and logs an error to the console if str couldn't be interpreted.

Token.Abstract: Attempts to interpret a string as a CGRect value.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The string to interpret.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an NSError instance in the event of a problem interpreting str. If non-nil and an error occurs, *errPtr will be set to an NSError instance indicating the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The CGRect value that corresponds with str. Returns CGRectZero if str couldn't be interpreted.

Token.Abstract: Attempts to interpret an arbitrary object value as a CGRect.

Parameter.Name: obj
Parameter.Abstract: The object to be interpreted.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an NSError instance in the event of a problem interpreting str. If non-nil and an error occurs, *errPtr will be set to an NSError instance indicating the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The CGRect value that corresponds with obj. Returns CGRectZero if obj couldn't be interpreted.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates an object expression and attempts to interpret the result as a CGRect value using the rectFromObject:error: method.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression whose result will be interpreted.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The CGRect value that corresponds with the result of evaluating expr as a string. Returns CGRectZero and logs an error to the console if the expression result couldn't be interpreted.

Token.Abstract: Converts a CGRect value into a string that can be parsed by rectFromString:.

Parameter.Name: val
Parameter.Abstract: The value to convert into a string.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string representation of val; never nil.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates an expression as a size dimension value.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The size dimension expression. This expression is expected to yield either a numeric value or a string containing only the wildcard character.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The value of the size dimension yielded by the expression expr.

Token.Abstract: Parses a string into a size dimension value.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The size dimension, as a string. This string is expected to contain either a numeric value or the wildcard character.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The value of the size dimension specified by str.

Token.Abstract: Parses a CGSize from a comma-separated string containing two components: a width and a height.

Parameter.Name: sizeStr
Parameter.Abstract: A string following the format "width,height" where each dimension is specified as a number or a wildcard character.

Parameter.Name: sizePtr
Parameter.Abstract: If the string to be parsed is in the expected format, on exit, the CGSize at the memory address sizePtr will be updated to reflect the value of the size dimensions parsed from sizeStr. No modification occurs if the method returns NO. This parameter must not be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES on success; NO if the input string is not in the expected format.

Token.Abstract: Parses a CGRect from a comma-separated string containing four components: the x and y coordinates of the rectangle's origin, followed by the width and height dimensions of the rectangle.

Parameter.Name: rectStr
Parameter.Abstract: A string following the format "originX,originY,width,height". The originX and originY values must be specified numerically. The width and height dimensions can either be specified as a number or a wildcard character.

Parameter.Name: rectPtr
Parameter.Abstract: If the string to be parsed is in the expected format, on exit, the CGRect at the memory address rectPtr will be updated to reflect the value of the rectangle parsed from rectStr. No modification occurs if the method returns NO. This parameter must not be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES on success; NO if the input string is not in the expected format.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression whose result will be interpreted.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The UIViewContentMode value that corresponds with the result of evaluating expr as a string. Returns UIViewContentModeScaleToFill and logs an error to the console if the expression result couldn't be interpreted.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The string to interpret.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an NSError instance in the event of a problem interpreting str. If non-nil and an error occurs, *errPtr will be set to an NSError instance indicating the error.
